definition: Kōbe, major Japanese port near Ōsaka

sentences.english: Soon afterward, swine flu was diagnosed in a Kobe High School athlete.
sentences.chinese: 以后很快，猪流感在神户中学运动员中被诊断出。

sentences.english: They vividly recall their own Kobe quake of 1995.
sentences.chinese: 他们还生动地回想起1995年的神户大地震。

sentences.english: From the architect. Nishinomiya is a city located between Osaka and Kobe.
sentences.chinese: 西宫市是一个位于大阪和神户之间的城市。

sentences.english: Remember the damage after Kobe, estimated at around $100 billion.
sentences.chinese: 当年神户地震后的投资额大约为一千亿美元。

sentences.english: Out of Kobe grew new civic-minded energies.
sentences.chinese: 神户的灾难使得新的热心公益的力量滋生。

sentences.english: My favorite restaurant offers choice steaks from Kobe.
sentences.chinese: 我最喜欢的那家餐馆供应神户产的中上级牛肉。

sentences.english: Sun talked to Kobe after China played Team USA in the Beijing Olympics.
sentences.chinese: 以孙神户交谈后，中国打美国队在北京奥运会。

sentences.english: I do not want to go to Tokyo, Osaka, Kobe and Nara.
sentences.chinese: 我不再想去东京，大阪，神户，奈良。

sentences.english: Kobe beef is a Japanese delicacy whose reputation precedes it.
sentences.chinese: 神户牛肉是日本闻名于世的一道佳肴。

sentences.english: The reporter said that Kobe wears number 24 and Jordan wore number 23.
sentences.chinese: 记者说，神户穿人数24和乔丹穿著23多项。

sentences.english: Compared to Kobe beef, skewers and other snacks, it is more mysterious.
sentences.chinese: 比起神户牛，串烧等小吃，它更有神秘感。

sentences.english: The middle of Kobe , SANNOMIYA area .
However, it de facto started around the time of the Kobe disaster.
sentences.chinese: 然而，事实上这是从神户灾难时开始的。
有些言论批评神户的反应。

sentences.english: Department of Microbial Chemistry, Kobe Pharmaceutical University, Japan.
sentences.chinese: 微生物化学部，神户药科大学，日本。

sentences.english: Though his offices were in Kobe, Burton often came down to Yokohama.
sentences.chinese: 尽管伯顿的办公室在神户，但他常驻来横滨。

definition: Ōsaka, a city and prefecture in Japan

Kagoshima, Japanese island prefecture off the south coast of Kyushu
